data.text:
This was our second trip to the Iberostar Selection Passeig de Gràcia and it was just as wonderful as the first time!

We were in touch with the amazing Nawal Kayou from Guest Services throughout our stay, who made sure we felt special and valued from the first day of our trip to the last. She even shared some gifts with us knowing it was our second lengthy stay at the hotel which we loved! This is why she manages guest services - because she’s obviously great at making the guest experience special! Thank you, Nawal! 

The staff at the hotel were so accommodating, especially given that we arrived much earlier than expected. While the room we requested wasn’t yet ready because the previous guests were still checking out, the front desk team offered to store our bags while we ventured into the city for a few hours. We were alerted when the room was available and were able to get settled into our temporary home for the next 11 days. 

The room itself was still fantastic, with the most incredible views of Barcelona.  (we were in the corner terrace room) I still love the fact that there is a refillable carafe for water, which is so much more sustainable than offering bottled water, not to mention kind for not charging $3 a bottle! The rain shower is also wonderful, so much so that I’m attempting to copy this in my apartment in NYC!

I can’t say enough about the team in Ca Menestral, the on-site restaurant we had our daily breakfast at. They were always so kind and some of them even remembered us from last year! Thanks to Chris, Alessandro, Jennifer x2, Gemma, and the others whose names I didn’t get but were so kind and accommodating. 

From the room and the views to the location, from the entire staff both front of house and back, this was another amazing experience at this hotel and my partner and I recommend it to anyone that is looking for a clean, comfortable, and perfectly centrally located stay in one of the best cities in the world. 

Thanks again to the Iberostar team for making our time in Catalonia an unforgettable experience!
data.title: When your Second stay is as amazing as your First…

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear John,

On behalf of the entire team, we would like to thank you for your loyalty to Iberostar and for taking the time to share your experience.

We are delighted that you had a wonderful time with us, and we appreciate your compliments regarding our remarkable team here. We are also pleased that you have noticed our water dispensers available on each floor as part of Iberostar´s numerous commendable initiatives to minimise environmental impacts and eliminate all single-use plastics in our hotels. 

We hope to have the honour of serving you again soon, and until then, we wish you the best. 

Kind regards,
Quality Manager, 
Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
owner_response.author: online experience Iberostar

data.text:
Just back from a 3 night stay at this wonderful hotel.
It is in the most central location, a minutes walk away from the aerobus/tourist/local buses/metro, la rambla, all the shops, bars and restaurants - you really cant get any closer! 
All the staff are super friendly and helpful. No one walked past without a smile and an “Hola”
The rooms are bright, clean, modern and spacious. There are water/ice machines in the corridors which we loved. 
The breakfast was really good with hot options available from a menu and cold options available from buffet. Such a nice relaxing breakfast and was a great way to start the day. 
Would absolutely stay here again if i return to Barcelona, and would recommend it to everyone. 
Ps. The hotel smells amazing!
data.title: Everything is great!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

We would like to thank you for sharing your positive review. We are delighted that your experience was so pleasant at our Iberostar Hotel and we hope to see you again very soon. 

Kind regards,
Quality Manager,
Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
owner_response.author: online experience Iberostar

data.text: Booked this hotel due to being located at the start line of Barcelona marathon. Perfect location for me a marathon participant and perfect location for exploring Barcelona. Lovely clean and comfortable room. Housekeeping staff deserve a special mention. Room was serviced and kept immaculate during our stay. Was also quiet despite overlooking a very busy road. We did not have breakfast as part of our stay as preferred to explore the local area for meals. Used the Skybar one afternoon and the view was amazing. I would definitely return to this hotel.
data.title: Barcelona Marathon stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Zoey,

We would like to thank you for choosing us for your holiday and we are very honoured to know that we have lived up to your expectations. We will be delighted to have the pleasure of your company again in the not too distant future.

Regards,
Quality Manager               
Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
owner_response.author: online experience Iberostar

data.text: This second time I stayed in this hotel my brother advised me to choose it was a good choice l liked the location and the view of rooms on Cataliena Square and all the staff were helpful especially Nawal always when we need any thing she helped us and got a warm welcome back from her realy she is a perfect employee in the hotel
data.title: Nice stay in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Sameera,

We would like you to accept our appreciation for the loyalty you have shown us by returning to our hotel for your most recent holiday. We have treated your description as a success story and your comments show that we are on the right track with our numerous efforts and our attention to detail. We would like to thank you once again for your kind review and will be delighted to welcome you back to our hotel again soon.

Best Regards,
Quality Manager
Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
owner_response.author: online experience Iberostar

data.text: Beautiful hotel and ideally located. My favorite was the skybar in the hotel with the amazing view. The service was also excellent. We were there last Friday and Mike and Jordie went above and beyond. Thank you for the excellent hospitality!!!
data.title: Thank you Mike and Jordie at the rooftop bar

Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia
